name: TetriFlow
description:
Get yourself over to the other white block! But you can only use Tetris blocks to create your path Created for the Triple Trijam game jam Total time taken = 8:00
(1st build = 2:40, 2nd build = 2:50, 3rd build = 2:30)

Controls
Move - WASD / ZQSD / Arrow Keys / IJKL
Mouse to press buttons

All 3 Themes:

  1. Novel Twist on Classic Game - Combining blocks from Tetris and paths from Flow Free
  2. Chain Reaction - Connect 4 blocks for each part of your path
  3. Negative Feedback Loop - The more you restart, the longer you have to complete the level (and vice versa)
